Head doesn't have any _test.go unit testsâ€”any and
all testing happens here.
-- in --
A
1
2
3
4
-- bottom 1 row --
{"N": 1}
-- want --
A
1
-- bottom 2 rows --
{"N": 2}
-- want --
A
1
2
-- to 2nd row from bottom --
{"N": 2, "FromBottom": true}
-- want --
A
1
2
3
-- to 3rd row from bottom --
{"N": 3, "FromBottom": true}
-- want --
A
1
2
-- to last row from bottom --
{"N": 1, "FromBottom": true}
-- want --
A
1
2
3
4
-- n greater-than num rows --
{"N": 10}
-- want --
A
1
2
3
4
-- n greater-than num rows, from bottom --
{"N": 10, "FromBottom": true}
-- want --
A
-- zero rows --
{"N": 0}
-- panic --
N = 0; N must be a positive int
